name: Scylla and Charybdis: A Grecian Ship From Olympus U
name_original: Scylla and Charybdis: A Grecian Ship From Olympus U
description:
Picking up from the end of Somnamulizer; Aergia awakens in a cave with her memories still wiped and finds herself caught up in the tumultuous relationship of a dysfunctional seamonster couple.

Created in the month of November 2015 for MAGS.
